title: thanksgivingcountdown
content:
With 38,000 meals to serve this Thanksgiving season, we need your help to stock our pantry!

A hot, "to go" Thanksgiving meal costs just $2.09 to serve -- even delicious holiday meals of turkey, stuffing, mashed potatoes, pumpkin pie and more.

The meals you provide mean so much to neighbors who are struggling financially during these trying times.

Thanks for donating as many meals as you can today!
